alert.note: Alert for Mecklenburg; Prince Edward (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 7:14PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A line of gusty showers will impact portions of north central Mecklenburg, Prince Edward, western Lunenburg and northwestern Nottoway Counties through 800 PM EST... At 713 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of gusty showers along a line extending from near Guinea Mills to near Abilene to near Mt Laurel. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Farmville, Chase City, Crewe, Victoria, Hampden Sydney, Hampden Sydney College, Longwood University, Lunenburg, Burkeville, Kells Corner, Rice, Rehoboth, Green Bay, Prince Edward Station, Briery, Arvins Store, Twin Lakes State Park, Nutbush, Finneywood and Fairview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
